title: dose perma ban ever get lifted?
body: I really whant my acc back I am on my happy piss again and I am sorry for being so toxic I really whant to be unbaneed admin can u help me at all

replies.body: Unfortunately no, permanent bans are never lifted unless it was a mistake on Riot's part. They already tried temporary (14 day ban) punishments, and only moved to a permaban when it did not work (unless what you did was so bad they escalated it straight to perma).

ar man u know how hard it is to lvl up in this game zzzz takes forever and when u get to rankt you need 15 or more plays zzz . ill just mute my team and take it slow or just rage at them when I mute them and unmute them when im calm down but thanks anyways
Hey btw, they can see what you say when you mute them. They have to mute you or you're gonna be talking mad shit and they'll think you're crazy.

good to know ty bro ahah and that's also why games like smite and dota 2 are more likeable they lvl u up faster and u carnt get perma ban u just go to low pro and also with csgo u only get perma if u are hacking
